item.title: My Thinking About Knowledge
item.description: What is knowledge? How many kinds of knowledge are there? How to represent knowledge? Language? Graph? Image? Energy? If statement? A new computer language? Until we are able to encode, store, and decode knowledge, we are not able to let computers accumulate knowledge, or learn like babies. At the core of General Artificial Intelligence is the ability to reason. At the core of reasoning is the ability to accumulate knowledge.
